name: Amass wealth
longDescription: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources and 3 trade goods

name: Build Defenses
longDescription: Have 4 or more structures (on the game board)

name: Corner the Market
longDescription: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait

name: Develop Weaponry
longDescription: Own 2 unit upgrade technologies

name: Discover Lost Outposts
longDescription: Control 2 planets that have attachments

name: Diversify Research
longDescription: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors

name: Engineer a Marvel
longDescription: Have your flagship or a war sun on the game board

name: Erect a Monument
longDescription: Spend 8 resources

name: Expand Borders
longDescription: Control 6 planets in non-home systems

name: Explore Deep Space
longDescription: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets

name: Found Research Outposts
longDescription: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties

name: Improve Infrastructure
longDescription: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system

name: Intimidate Council
longDescription: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex's System

name: Lead From the Front
longDescription: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools

name: Make History
longDescription: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex or anomalies

name: Negotiate Trade Routes
longDescription: Spend 5 trade goods

name: Populate the Outer Rim
longDescription: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board (other than your home system)

name: Push Boundaries
longDescription: Control more planets than each of 2 of your neighbors

name: Raise a Fleet
longDescription: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in one system

name: Sway the Council
longDescription: Spend 8 influence

name: Achieve Supremacy
longDescription: Have your flagship or a war sun in another player's home system or the Mecatol Rex system

name: Become a Legend
longDescription: Have units in 4 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies

name: Centralize Galactic Trade
longDescription: Spend 10 trade goods

name: Command an Armada
longDescription: Have 8 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system

name: Conquer the Weak
longDescription: Control 1 planet that is in another player's home system

name: Construct Massive Cities
longDescription: Have 7 or more structures (on the game board)

name: Control the Borderlands
longDescription: Have unit in 5 systems on the edge of the game board (other than your home system)

name: Form Galactic Brain Trust
longDescription: Control 5 planets that have technology specialties

name: Found a Golden Age
longDescription: Spend 16 resources

name: Galvanize the People
longDescription: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools

name: Hold Vast Reserves
longDescription: Spend 6 influence, 6 resources and 6 trade goods

name: Manipulate Galactic Law
longDescription: Spend 16 influence

name: Master the Sciences
longDescription: Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors

name: Patrol Vast Territories
longDescription: Have units in 5 systems that do not contain planets

name: Protect the Border
longDescription: Have structures on 5 planets outside of your home system

name: Reclaim Ancient Monuments
longDescription: Control 3 planets that have attachments

name: Revolutionize Warfare
longDescription: Own 3 unit upgrade technologies

name: Rule Distant Lands
longDescription: Control 2 planets that are each in or adjacent to a different, other player's home system

name: Subdue the Galaxy
longDescription: Control 11 planets in non-home systems

name: Unify the Colonies
longDescription: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait
